import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import './AllScenarios.css' const AllScenarios = () => { const [data,setdata]=useState((JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('scenarios')))) console.log(data) const [second, setsecond]=useState(0) const handledelete=(e)=> { localStorage.removeItem('scenarios') console.log(e) } return (

Scenario

{data.map((data,i)=>(
))}
Scenario Id Scenario Name Scenario Time Number of Vehicle Add Vehicle Edit Delete
{1-i} {data.name} {data.seconds} {data.seconds}
) } export default AllScenarios
